price: Nta kindi cyawukumira usibye Allah (ushobora kuwihutisha cyangwa akawutinza).
arabic: لَيۡسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: laysa lahā min dūni al-lahi kāshifatun
